# digest

**Instance Property**

A 64-bit digest that uniquely describes the contents of the input to a processor.

## Declaration

```swift
var digest: UInt64 { get }
```

## Discussion

This digest will change if the graph of the input changes in any way.

## Instance Properties

- **roiTileCount**: This property tells a tiled-input processor how many input tiles will be processed.
- **roiTileIndex**: This property tells a tiled-input processor which input tile index is being processed.
